
IF(MSVC)
	FOREACH(c ${CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES})
		FILE(COPY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/LookupTables
			DESTINATION ${CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY}/${c})
	ENDFOREACH()
ELSE()
	if(NOT IS_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/LookupTables)
		MESSAGE(WARNING "Could not find ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/LookupTables")
	ELSE()
		FILE(COPY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/LookupTables
			DESTINATION ${CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
	ENDIF()
ENDIF()
